songs.title: Alone Again
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
There's no escape from that choice
We're miles away
So sad to say goodbye to you

[Verse 1]
We stand alone from the day we're born till the day we die
This is the law of nature
We cannot escape the loneliness
Though many men have tried
To take away the pain we always feel the same

[Chorus]
Alone again
Haven't we been here before
Alone again
I don't know how will survive
Alone again
Now we're back where we started
Alone again
I thank God I'm alive

[Verse 2]
We stand alone from the day we're born till the day we die
This is the law of nature
We cannot escape from the loneliness
Though many men have tried
To take away the pain we always feel the same

[Chorus]
Alone again
Haven't we been here before
Alone again
I don't know how will survive
Alone again
Now we're back where we started
Alone again
I thank God I'm alive
